name: Serenitea
description:
Experience working at a quirky tea shop situated in the journey between the living realm and the afterlife. Talk to your ghostly patrons and find out what teas would best suit their needs then craft them with different whimsical ingredients. Experiment and unwind by crafting recipes in this light-hearted, narrative oriented café sim!

Credits:

  • Production & Design - Karolina Myszkowska
  • Art - Aaron Petherbridge
  • Programming - Daniel Paul
  • Narrative Design - Jak Knowles
  • Tea Design - Yinan Gu & Yunfeng Ma
